com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.progression

Class ReinforcePhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.progression.AbstractPhase
      • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.progression.ReinforcePhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Phase

    public class ReinforcePhase
extends AbstractPhase
    A Phase that is meant to add value to Territories incrementally. It can also calculate how much value should be allocated to the given Player on the current Phase.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.progression.AbstractPhase

        pendingAction, player, selected, territoryLimit

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReinforcePhase(Player player)
      Creates a Reinforcement phase controlled by the current player that will put 1 dice on each Territory selected until the dice allocated run out.

    • Method Summary
